'''Michael Condron''' is an English actor. He has appeared in TV Shows such as ''Pulling Moves'' or ''The Tudors''.

In [[Season 5]] he will portray [[Bowen Marsh]], First Steward of the [[Night's Watch]].<ref>[http://www.universalartists.co.uk/Producer/Artist.aspx?ID=c6acc2b6-9bb0-4b5c-adc1-630992f3b578]</ref> Although it was believedÂ [[Brian Fortune]] was playing the role in [[Season 1]], his character was identified as [[Othell Yarwyck]] in [[Season 4]].
